Text: I know this is dumb but im new to biratebay. Where are the instructions?

User Type: When you get the black screen
Username: quit the application and put back the original mdm.dat file. Start the application again. Don't register
Date: choose activate later. Worked for me - successfully installed Chinese Mandarin L1
Text: L2 and L3. At least L1 seems to work OK - sound and pronunciation check working. Haven't tried L2 and L3 yet.
